sentence: Because Democrats have made masking a test of one's good character, Abrams opened herself up to allegations of hypocrisy and unseriousness, allegations that were quickly and rightly supplied by Republican critics such as Governor Brian Kemp and former senator David Perdue.
author: NR Editors
title: The Week
